choose_environment: In which environment would you like to play?
how_many_players: How many people will be playing this campaign?
whats_your_character_name: What is the name of your character?
all_players_send_message: All players, please send 'I am playing'.
confirm_reset: Are you sure you want to reset the campaign? Reply with 'yes' or 'no'.
reset_timeout: You did not reply in time. Reset cancelled.
config_complete: Setup complete, I am creating a new Universe.
